snippet: In his third position on the offensive line in three years at Alabama, center Barrett Jones has displayed his adaptability by studying the formations and schemes of defenses.
abstract: Alabama center Barrett Jones has demonstrated his versatility by playing three different positions on the team; off the football field he often does volunteer work and has been named to the Allstate AFCA Good Works Team for his community service.
lead_paragraph: In his third position on the offensive line in three years at Alabama, center Barrett Jones has displayed his adaptability by studying the formations and schemes of defenses.

headline.seo: Alabama Center Barrett Jones Adapts on Offensive Line
headline.main: Skilled at Seeing Surprises, Most of the Time
headline.print_headline: Skilled at Seeing Surprises, Player Misses One Off Field
